accept.description: File types accepted by the input. See html file type input [accept property](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input/file#accept).

s3PostPolicyMutationId.description: Id of a mutation of type AwsS3PresignedPostPolicy that defines to which S3 bucket and how the file should be uploaded.

showUploadList.description: Whether to show default upload list.

singleFile.description: Only allow a single file to be uploaded. Only one file can be selected in the prompt and the upload button is disabled after a file is uploaded.

onChange.description: Triggered when the upload state is changing.

onClick.description: Triggered when the upload button is clicked.
